Subtract ts_mean(30d) from current buy value to find divergence. SUGGESTION1 single field used. SUGGESTION2 not applicable. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 applied. KEEP_IN_MIND met. Confidence: 0.63

zscore of buy value normalized by number of holders to detect unusual per-holder injection across cross-section. SUGGESTION1 used two fields. SUGGESTION2 not applicable. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 applied. KEEP_IN_MIND respected. Confidence: 0.69

results.idea: Rapid drop in institutional book (ts_delta negative)
results.description: ts_delta on value held by institutions to detect rapid declines in book size (potential sell-off). SUGGESTION1 single field used. SUGGESTION2 not applicable. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 applied. KEEP_IN_MIND satisfied. Confidence: 0.58

ts_std_dev of buyer count to gauge inconsistency in institutional participation. SUGGESTION1 single field used. SUGGESTION2 not applicable. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 applied. KEEP_IN_MIND respected. Confidence: 0.52

results.idea: Normalized net flow by aggregate owners
results.description: net value flow divided by aggregate_equity_value_all_owners to find relative security-level perturbation vs total owner equity. SUGGESTION1 used two fields. SUGGESTION2 not applicable. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 caution: aggregate field lower userCount. KEEP_IN_MIND satisfied. Confidence: 0.47

ts_ir of (value bought/value sold) to detect stability in imbalance. SUGGESTION1 used two fields. SUGGESTION2 not applicable. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 applied. KEEP_IN_MIND kept. Confidence: 0.55

zscore of ((value bought/value held) - (value sold/value held)) to detect net per-capita shifts. SUGGESTION1 used two fields. SUGGESTION2 not applicable. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 applied. KEEP_IN_MIND kept concise. Confidence: 0.68

results.idea: Buy concentration by small base (buyers/total buyers universe scaled)
results.description: buyers divided by sum buyers across universe could be implemented cross-sectionally via quantile of buyers proportion; here use buyer count quantile. SUGGESTION1 single field. SUGGESTION2 not applicable. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 applied. KEEP_IN_MIND met. Confidence: 0.53

results.idea: Rapid increase in buy value per buyer
results.description: ts_delta of (value bought / num_buyers) to find sudden per-buyer uptick. SUGGESTION1 used two fields. SUGGESTION2 not applicable. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 applied. KEEP_IN_MIND satisfied. Confidence: 0.66
